mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_CHANNEL_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_DESC, GOODS_TP_ID, GOODS_PROVINCE_ID, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_AMOUNT, GOODS_STATE, GOODS_EXPIRE, GMT_CREATE, GMT_UPDATE
mapper.select: SELECT g1.* FROM flow_goods g1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(GOODS_PRICE) AS price, g.GOODS_NAME, g.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID FROM flow_goods g, resource_area r, flow_telecom_operator tp WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( g.GOODS_AMOUNT = - 1 OR g.GOODS_AMOUNT > 0 ) AND g.GOODS_STATE = '1' AND g.GOODS_TP_ID = tp.id AND TP_NAME = #{tpName} AND r.parentid = 0 AND r.shortname = #{provinceShortName} AND ( g.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID = r.id OR g.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID = 0 ) GROUP BY g.GOODS_NAME, g.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID ) m ON m.price = g1.GOODS_PRICE AND m.GOODS_NAME = g1.GOODS_NAME AND m.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID = g1.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID GROUP BY g1.GOODS_NAME, g1.GOODS_PROVINCE_ID ORDER BY (g1.GOODS_NAME + 0)
mapper.insert:
insert into flow_goods
ID,
GOODS_CHANNEL_ID,
GOODS_NAME,
GOODS_DESC,
GOODS_TP_ID,
GOODS_PROVINCE_ID,
GOODS_PRICE,
GOODS_AMOUNT,
GOODS_STATE,
GOODS_EXPIRE,
GMT_CREATE,
GMT_UPDATE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsTpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update flow_goods
GOODS_CHANNEL_ID = #{goodsChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_DESC = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TP_ID = #{goodsTpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GOODS_PROVINCE_ID = #{goodsProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS_AMOUNT = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_STATE = #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_EXPIRE = #{goodsExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_UPDATE = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update flow_goods set GOODS_CHANNEL_ID = #{goodsChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_DESC = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_TP_ID = #{goodsTpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GOODS_PROVINCE_ID = #{goodsProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_AMOUNT = #{goodsAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_STATE = #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_EXPIRE = #{goodsExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_UPDATE = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
